name: VR Heist Early Concept
description:
This is the uploaded proof of concept driving simulator for a much bigger idea. This uses Steam VR to function and may require binding through the user's end. 

This is a project I may return to another day, but for now enjoy driving around in VR.

Use Grip to grab the steering wheel and press trigger to start driving, the gear shift adjusts speed and allows you to reverse. 

VR Headset Required
